oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of diaryl selenides using the in situ reagent SeCl2
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ZADE, SS
PANDA, S
SINGH, HB
WOLMERSHAUSER, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: free-radical synthesis
x-ray structures
organoselenium compounds
coordination chemistry
peroxidase-activity
diselenides
ebselen
analogs
antioxidants
crystal
selenium dichloride
2-phenyl-1,2-benzisoselenazol-3(2h)-one
lithiation
diorganoselenide
benzamide
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Reactions of in situ prepared SeCl2 With Grignard reagents (prepared from bromobenzene, o-tolyl bromide, 2,6-dimethyl-4-tert-butyl-l-bromobenzene, and 1-bromo-2-methylnaphthalene) and dilithiated benzamides (prepared from N-phenyl, N-cyclohexyl, and N-isopropyl benzamide) are described.
